verses.verse: During <S%G1722><s%> Which Things <S%G3739><s%> Being Gathered Together <S%G1996><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Myriads <S%G3461><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> So As <S%G5620><s%> To Trample Upon <S%G2662><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> First, <S%G4412><s%> Take Heed <S%G4337><s%> To Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leaven <S%G2219><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Hypocrisy; <S%G5272><s%>

<S%G3762><s%> But Nothing <S%G1161><s%> Covered Up <S%G4780><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Be Uncovered, <S%G601><s%> Nor <S%G2532><s%> Hidden <S%G2927><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Shall Be Known; <S%G1097><s%>

<S%G473><s%> Wherefore <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G3745><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4653><s%> Ye Said, <S%G2036><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> Shall Be Heard; <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> In <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ear <S%G3775><s%> Ye Spoke <S%G2980><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Chambers, <S%G5009><s%> Shall Be Proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Housetops. <S%G1430><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> But I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5384><s%> <S%G3450><s%> My Friends, <S%G3361><s%> Ye Should Not Fear <S%G5399><s%> Because Of <S%G575><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Kill <S%G615><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body, <S%G4983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> These Things <S%G3361><s%> Are Not Able <S%G2192><s%> <S%G4053><s%> Anything More <S%G5100><s%> To Do. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G5263><s%> But I Will Shew <S%G1161><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> Ye Should Fear : <S%G5399><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Being Killed, <S%G615><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> To Cast <S%G1685><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gehenna; <S%G1067><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Him <S%G5126><s%> Fear. <S%G5399><s%>

Not <S%G3780><s%> Five <S%G4002><s%> Sparrows <S%G4765><s%> Are Sold <S%G4453><s%> For Assaria <S%G787><s%> Two? <S%G1417><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Forgotten <S%G1950><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hairs <S%G2359><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2776><s%> Of Your Head <S%G5216><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Have Been Numbered. <S%G705><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Fear, <S%G5399><s%> Than Many <S%G4183><s%> Sparrows <S%G4765><s%> Ye Are Better. <S%G1308><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> But I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Every One <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G302><s%> <S%G3670><s%> May Confess <S%G1722><s%> Me <S%G1698><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3670><s%> Will Confess <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Has Denied <S%G720><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G444><s%> Will Be Denied <S%G533><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God; <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Every One <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Shall Say <S%G2046><s%> A Word <S%G3056><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man, <S%G444><s%> It Will Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But To Him Who <S%G1161><s%> Against <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Has Blasphemed <S%G987><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Will Not Be Forgiven. <S%G863><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> They Bring <S%G4374><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Before <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Synagogues <S%G4864><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rulers <S%G746><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1849><s%> Authorities, <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Careful <S%G3309><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Shall Reply In Defence, <S%G626><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Should Say; <S%G2036><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Will Teach <S%G1321><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That Same <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> It Behooves You <S%G1163><s%> To Say. <S%G2036><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Speak <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> To My Brother <S%G3450><s%> To Divide <S%G3307><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inheritance. <S%G2817><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Appointed <S%G2525><s%> A Judge <S%G1348><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> A Divider <S%G3312><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> You? <S%G5209><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> See <S%G3708><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Keep Yourselves <S%G5442><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Covetousness; <S%G4124><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Abundance <S%G4052><s%> To Anyone <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2222><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5224><s%> He Possesses. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Spoke <S%G1161><s%> A Parable <S%G3850><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Of A Man <S%G444><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Rich <S%G4145><s%> Brought Forth Abundantly <S%G2164><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground. <S%G5561><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Reasoning <S%G1260><s%> Within <S%G1722><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall I Do, <S%G4160><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Have Not <S%G2192><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> I Shall Lay Up <S%G4863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2590><s%> My Fruit? <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Will I Do : <S%G4160><s%> I Will Take Away <S%G2507><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Granaries, <S%G596><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Greater <S%G3173><s%> Will Build, <S%G3618><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Lay Up <S%G4863><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1081><s%> My Produce <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G18><s%> My Good Things, <S%G3450><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Say <S%G2046><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> To My Soul, <S%G3450><s%> Soul, <S%G5590><s%> Thou Hast <S%G2192><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Good Things <S%G18><s%> Laid By <S%G2749><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Years <S%G2094><s%> Many; <S%G4183><s%> Take Thy Rest, <S%G373><s%> Eat, <S%G5315><s%> Drink, <S%G4095><s%> Be Merry. <S%G2165><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> But Said <S%G1161><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Fool, <S%G878><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Soul <S%G5590><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> They Require <S%G523><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> <S%G4675><s%> Thee; <S%G3739><s%> And What <S%G1161><s%> Thou Didst Prepare <S%G2090><s%> To Whom <S%G5101><s%> Shall Be? <S%G2071><s%>
Thus Is <S%G3779><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Treasures Up <S%G2343><s%> For Himself, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Toward <S%G1519><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Is Rich. <S%G4147><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3004><s%> I Say, <S%G3361><s%> Be Not Careful <S%G3309><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> , As To Your Life <S%G5216><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Should Eat, <S%G5315><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> As To The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Should Put On. <S%G1746><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G5590><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> Food, <S%G5160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> Raiment. <S%G1742><s%>

Consider <S%G2657><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ravens, <S%G2876><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> They Sow <S%G4687><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Reap, <S%G2325><s%> To Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Storehouse <S%G5009><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Granary, <S%G596><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Feeds <S%G5142><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%> How Much <S%G4214><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Are Better <S%G1308><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> Birds? <S%G4071><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> And Who <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> By Being Careful <S%G3308><s%> <S%G3309><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Add <S%G4369><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2244><s%> His Stature <S%G846><s%> Cubit <S%G4083><s%> One? <S%G1520><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Not Even The <S%G3777><s%> Least <S%G1646><s%> Ye Are Able To Do, <S%G1410><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> Are Ye Careful? <S%G3309><s%>

Consider <S%G2657><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lilies, <S%G2918><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> They Grow; <S%G837><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Labour Not, <S%G2872><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Do They Spin; <S%G3514><s%> <S%G3004><s%> But I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> His Glory <S%G846><s%> Was Clothed <S%G4016><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Of These. <S%G5130><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Grass <S%G5528><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Field <S%G68><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> Which Is, <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tomorrow <S%G839><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> An Oven <S%G2823><s%> Is Cast, <S%G906><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Arrays, <S%G294><s%> How Much <S%G4214><s%> Rather <S%G3123><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> O Ye Of Little Faith? <S%G3640><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5210><s%> Ye <S%G3361><s%> Seek Ye Not <S%G2212><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye May Eat <S%G5315><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye May Drink, <S%G4095><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Be Not In Anxiety; <S%G3349><s%>

These Things <S%G5023><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Seek After; <S%G1934><s%> <S%G5216><s%> And Your <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Knows <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Have Need Of <S%G5535><s%> These Things. <S%G5130><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> Seek Ye <S%G2212><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> , Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Shall Be Added <S%G4369><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> Fear, <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Little <S%G3398><s%> Flock, <S%G4168><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Took Delight <S%G2106><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> In Giving <S%G1325><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

Sell <S%G4453><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5224><s%> Your Possessions, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Alms; <S%G1654><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> To Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Purses <S%G905><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Growing Old, <S%G3822><s%> A Treasure <S%G2344><s%> Unfailing <S%G413><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Thief <S%G2812><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Does Not Draw Near, <S%G1448><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Moth <S%G4597><s%> Destroy. <S%G1311><s%>

<S%G3699><s%> For Where <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2344><s%> Your Treasure, <S%G5216><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Heart <S%G5216><s%> Will Be. <S%G2071><s%>
Let Be <S%G2077><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Loins <S%G3751><s%> Girded About <S%G4024><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lamps <S%G3088><s%> Burning; <S%G2545><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> To Men <S%G444><s%> Waiting For <S%G4327><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Their Lord, <S%G1438><s%> Whenever <S%G4219><s%> He Shall Return <S%G360><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wedding Feasts, <S%G1062><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Knocked, <S%G2925><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> They May Open <S%G455><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Shall Find <S%G2147><s%> Watching. <S%G1127><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Will Gird Himself <S%G4024><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Make Recline <S%G347><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Coming Up <S%G3928><s%> Will Serve <S%G1247><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>
